mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction (title, minSalary, maxSalary, occupation, period, education, employmentType, stack, certification, location, portfolio, startDate, endDate, state, startPrice, bidMaxPrice,id) VALUES (#{title}, #{minSalary}, #{maxSalary}, #{occupation}, #{period}, #{education}, #{employmentType}, #{stack}, #{certification}, #{location}, #{portfolio}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{state}, #{startPrice}, #{bidMaxPrice},#{id});
INSERT INTO transaction (sellerId, auctionNum, bidNum, buyerId, date, price, state, memType) VALUES (#{sellerId}, #{auctionNum}, #{bidNum}, #{buyerId}, NOW(), #{price}, 'i', #{memType});
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM bid WHERE auctionNum = #{auctionNum} AND bidState = 2;
mapper.update: update auction set bidMaxPrice=#{bidMaxPrice}, state=#{state}, endDate=#{endDate} where auctionNum=#{auctionNum}
mapper.select: select a.*, p.nickname,p.email,p.address,p.sex,p.age,p.personimage,p.status from auction as a inner join person as p on a.id = p.id where auctionNum=#{auctionNum}

select a.* , p.* from auction a JOIN person p ON a.id = p.id WHERE a.id = #{sellerId} and a.state !='success'
and STR_TO_DATE(a.startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between STR_TO_DATE(#{filterDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')
and STR_TO_DATE(a.startDate, '%Y-%m-%d') between STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') and STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY case when a.state = 'processing' then 1 when a.state = 'unprocessing' then 2 ELSE 3 END, a.endDate DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset};
